thread.title: The beer company that’s owned by its workers
thread.title_full: Video: The beer company that’s owned by its workers | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: The beer company that’s owned by its workers
text: Colorado's New Belgium Brewing is known for its quirky culture, its Fat Tire beer and its distinction as a worker-owned business. Why did the founder of this successful craft brewery sell to her employees? Economics correspondent Paul Solman reports.
